search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for OnlineCourseHost.com (onlinecoursehostcom.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text:
The official pricing page for OnlineCourseHost.com is available at:

https://onlinecoursehost.com/#pricing 【3:0†source】

extracted_content.content:
Do you need a public or private course website?
-----------------------------------------------

We serve two types of course creators: creators selling courses online via a payment gateway, or companies or institutions that want to set up their own private course academy.

![Image 1: cheers_hnds](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/cheers_hnds.png)

Course creators \*really\* like OCH!
------------------------------------

![Image 2: testimonial_images](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/tstm_13.png)

![Image 3: stars](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rvw_strs_2.svg)

### Now AI Assistant ... amongs my other two reviews.

I've already shared a couple of reviews about this LMS, but I have to say it continues to impress me. The way it extracts content from lesson descriptions and turns it into a conversational format really enhances the learning experience.

One feature that stands out is the AI Assistant, which is freely available to students. This tool further supports them on their learning journey, providing helpful guidance and answering questions as they arise.

It simplifies the course creation process, making things much easier for me as an instructor. I'm thankful to Michael for providing such useful features. This platform truly makes a difference in how I teach and how my students learn.

###### Tushar PARMAR

Verified User

![Image 4: testimonial_images](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/tstm_1.png)

![Image 5: stars](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rvw_strs_2.svg)

### Wow, I didn't expect it to be this good!

With three businesses that sell courses, I was looking to take my ongoing subscriptions and save money while I scale with a lifetime subscription. I ummed and ahhed and eventually decided to go for OnlineCourseHost.com as I felt it covered my basic needs while being an extremely affordable option... what I hadn't expected was that it would be insanely good. I am so impressed with the features and user-friendliness of the platform. I have almost moved my first course over in its entirety and look forward to getting it live on the platform. Very happy customer!

###### ZoeyHughes

Verified User

![Image 6: testimonial_images](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/tstm_2.png)

![Image 7: stars](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rvw_strs_2.svg)

### Bravo !!!

Hello,

You've hit the jackpot; I can finally sell my courses! Congratulations on the user-friendliness of the website (for both admins and students). You've thought of the teachers who may not necessarily be computer experts!

Thanks to your product, my marketing agency will be able to offer an additional service, which is training for entrepreneurs who wish to take advantage of it.

A shoutout to your technical team who helped me set up the domain name, very patient and highly competent! Thanks to them, I'll be able to establish authority on the web with the many courses I have yet to upload!

Please continue to provide us with high-quality products!

Regards

###### Oasis

Verified User

![Image 8: testimonial_images](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/tstm_3.png)

![Image 9: stars](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rvw_strs_2.svg)

### Way better than you might think

Course platforms are everywhere - most are bland and feature poor, and some are really expensive for the privelege (I'm looking at you Kajabi!).

But OCH is something else - feature rich with more to come. My first course gave me all the options I wanted. I also really like the onboarding - tons of content on how to create, market and sell your courses.

Bottom line - they care about user success on the platform and I'm delighted to be part of the OCH gang. Finally, FINALLY I'm no longer looking for the right platform - found it and got it with OCH.

###### Neil Gowans

Verified User

Powerful AI Features **for both you and your students**
-------------------------------------------------------

Create engaging courses effortlessly and help your students learn faster with our AI-powered tools. From generating course materials to personalized student guidance - ourAI has got you covered.

### AI Creator Assistant

*   Optimize course content with smart AI suggestions.
*   Optimize your course sales page with AI suggestions.
*   Get AI help for answering student questions, marketing, and more.

[Learn more about the Creator Assistant ![Image 10: arrow](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rgt_pnk_arw.svg)](https://onlinecoursehost.com/ai-assistant.html)

![Image 11](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/ai_crtr_img.png)

### AI Student Assistant

*   Help students learn faster with AI-powered tools.
*   Let students clarify doubts without your direct intervention.
*   Give students personalized one-on-one AI Assistance

[Learn more about the Student Assistant ![Image 12: arrow](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rgt_pnk_arw.svg)](https://onlinecoursehost.com/student-assistant.html)

![Image 13](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/ai_stdnt_img.png)

All the course creation and marketing tools that you need in one single place!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

From numerous options for your payment gateway of choice to all the course-building and marketing features that you will need, we’ve got you covered.

###### Sell courses around the globe in a tax-compliant way.

##### Sell courses via Stripe, Paypal, and many other local payment gateways. Accept installments.

*   ![Image 14: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_1.svg)
    
*   ![Image 15: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_2.svg)
    
*   ![Image 16: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_3.svg)
    
*   ![Image 17: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_4.svg)
    
*   ![Image 18: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_5.svg)
    
*   ![Image 19: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_6.svg)
    
*   ![Image 20: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_7.svg)
    
*   ![Image 21: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_8.svg)
    
*   ![Image 22: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_9.svg)
    
*   ![Image 23: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_10.svg)
    
*   ![Image 24: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_11.svg)
    
*   ![Image 25: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_12.svg)
    
*   ![Image 26: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_13.svg)
    
*   ![Image 27: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_14.svg)
    
*   ![Image 28: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_15.svg)
    
*   ![Image 29: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_16.svg)
    
*   ![Image 30: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_17.svg)
    
*   ![Image 31: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_18.svg)
    
*   ![Image 32: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_19.svg)
    
*   ![Image 33: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_20.svg)
    
*   ![Image 34: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_21.svg)
    
*   ![Image 35: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_22.svg)
    
*   ![Image 36: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_23.svg)
    
*   ![Image 37: accept_icons](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/accept_icons/accpt_icn_24.svg)
    

Create your course in minutes with our easy-to-use Course Builder
-----------------------------------------------------------------

*   Host your online courses in our white-label online course platform with no platform fees, unlimited students, risk free.
*   Create your own online courses and website in just a few minutes using our course and website builder, no design or technical skills are needed.
*   Promote your courses with our powerful marketing features. Send newsletters, grow your email list, optimize your ads.

[Learn more about the Course Builder ![Image 38: arrow](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rgt_pnk_arw.svg)](https://onlinecoursehost.com/course-builder.html)

![Image 39: course_itm_sec_img](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/course-builder.png)

Create landing pages for your courses with our Website Builder
--------------------------------------------------------------

Optionally build any extra page that you need besides course pages, such as: home page, long-form sales pages, promotion page, bundle page, testimonials, and more.

*   Our flexible and easy-to-use page builder allows you to build any page that you want. The builder can be used by non-designers, but still has the flexibility to fully customize your page, including with custom HTML.
*   You don’t have to build your pages completely from scratch, we will provide you with beautifully designed templates that you can use as a starting point.

[Learn more about the page builder ![Image 40: arrow](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rgt_pnk_arw.svg)](https://onlinecoursehost.com/page-builder.html) [Try it for free for 30 days ![Image 41: arrow](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/rgt_pnk_arw.svg)](https://app.onlinecoursehost.com/platform-login)

![Image 42: course_itm_sec_img](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/web-builder.png)

And many more features
----------------------

The OCH course platform is an all-in-one solution to help you build, host and sell your own courses, host your private community, market your courses, and more.

User Friendly Interface

Powerful Marketing Features

First Class Student Experience

Online Payments

It Really Is Your Brand

Learn From Other Course Creators

Powerful Integration

Choose Your Business Model

![Image 43: mny_mre_pple](https://onlinecoursehost.com/img/images_2024/mny_mre_pple.png)

Keep in touch with us
---------------------

Join the thousands of course creators who get our email newsletter. We’ll share product updates, thoughts, new releases, and other tidbits we think you’ll find interesting.

We’re here to help.
-------------------

There are no stupid questions. For pre-sales questions, existing customers who need a hand, or other inquiries, contact us and we’ll get back to you within an hour.

The ultimate all-in-one platform to create, host, and sell online courses - community included.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The platform offers a free trial for 30 days and includes a free tier with no platform fees and unlimited students.

features: Access to course and website builder

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The platform offers a free tier and a 30-day free trial for its services.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic features for course creation and hosting.
Advanced features for course creation, hosting, and marketing.
features: AI-powered tools for course creation and student assistance
